title: Flying
text: It a good airlines , friendly staff, good ground service, but the flight delayed , however the seats were good

title: Flying
text: It is a very nice airline, very friendly staff and helpful , very strict to time . But the space between seats are very tight, very good flight services and food .

title: Lunch
text: It’s a unique of it’s kind , different kind of food very special, nice place to be , very friendly staff, and reasonable prices

title: Visit
text: Very nice site , all brand goods, it is outdoor unfortunately, but still very nice experience, the restaurants and cafes are very little and not good quality food , no good quality food quart their.

title: Riding
text: We took the bus from Milan to Serravalle outlet it was very nice ride, on time but they change their time from their site without notice.
place: Serravalle Outlet Luxury Bus Shopping Tour from Milan

title: Lunch
text: Very nice food , Greek food and all other kind of food , it has good taste , the site is very nice, very friendly staff , if you want to eat Greek food it is recommended.

title: Dinner
text: It’s a nice restaurant , the food was ok , the service was bad some of the staff was rude, some orders was delayed after we finish eating, but the visit whole was good .

title: Visit
text: This square is very nice , different people from different nationality’s, ice cream is very tasty, small souvenirs shops , just beautiful.

title: Visit
text: It’s ok but boring, their are a nice garden nearby which is very nice you can spend time in their , listening to music and eating some chestnut.

title: Visit
text: Very nice place to visit and shop , allthough it’s expensive, the restaurants their are very rude may be because of the big number of customers.

title: Visit
text: Very nice views of Athens, nice cafe and restaurant, one of kind experience of cable cars , and very nice natural surroundings .

title: Dinner
text: Excellent food , friendly staff, nice place, delicious taste, best taste you could find in Athens, I strongly recommend.

title: Tour
text: It was very nice city tour , reasonable price , but confusing branching , the buses needs maintenance, but it was good overall.
place: City Sightseeing Athens & Beach Riviera Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour

title: Accommodation
text: It was very good experience, good breakfast friendly staff, little harsh in recitation, rooms are very hot can’t control ac , Site is away from center , but it was good overall, if I visit Milan again I may go back their again.

title: Lunch
text: It was good experience, variety of dishes , good taste, very friendly staff . I advise everyone to try this restaurant.

title: Lunch
text: Excellent food , excellent drinks, excellent spot downtown, excellent staff, reasonable prices.. eat their.

title: Lunch
text: V good food has some taste, different kind of meat smoked and dry meat with spices , very worm welcoming staff.

title: Visit
text: It is very good site to visit , you need to climb up , it is clean but so many homeless and poor people asking for mony .

title: Visit
text: It was well organized site , reasonable tickets prices, easy to find and visit , there’s a guide available to whom how need.

title: Lunch
text:
Very bad quality food has no taste
Very expensive not valued for money
Trying to be Friendly staff .
